activities: S2Verify, LLC provides our clients with employment screening (Vetting)in the United States and Internationally.  To provide this service to our clients, we might obtain personal information on the individual.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: All consumers whether US based or International have the ability to file a complaint with our consumer department via email or telephone.  All complaints are investigated immediately to ensure accuracy and efficacy of the data. At a minimum, disputes are resolved within 30 days of receipt.  If we cannot resolve the complaint, we agree to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles, as well as to cooperate and comply with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
